alert.note: Alert for Lewis and Southern Nez Perce Counties (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 21 at 9:35AM MST until February 22 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 4 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 4 AM PST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations 2 to 6 inches. * WHERE...Nezperce, Winchester, Kamiah, Craigmont, and Soldiers Meadow Road. * WHEN...From 4 PM this afternoon to 4 AM PST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the Tuesday evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Flash freeze conditions may occur with dropping temperatures and snowfall on cold roads.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Lewis and Southern Nez Perce Counties
